problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ABC的平分线与∠ACB的外角平分线相交于D点,∠A=50°,则∠D=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, the bisector of ∠ABC and the outer bisector of ∠ACB intersect at point D, ∠A = N_0, then ∠D = ()
raw_answer: 解:∵∠ABC的平分线与∠ACB的外角平分线相交于D点,∴∠1=\frac{1}{2}∠ACE,∠2=\frac{1}{2}∠ABC又∠D=∠1-∠2,∠A=∠ACE-∠ABC,∴∠D=\frac{1}{2}∠A=25^{°}.故选C.
